channel.title: Festival Hub – Horizon Festival | Sunshine Coast
channel.description: Presenting 10 days and nights of visual art, music, theatre, dance, words + ideas, film and creative workshops; inspired by the stories and beauty of the Sunshine Coast.

item.title: Superpowered on Tour
item.dc:creator: ben
item.description: Experience the free ‘Superpowered on Tour’ program in the Festival Hub garden as part of Horizon Kids. This program will feature activities created by the Children’s Art Centre in collaboration with four Australian artists – Kaylene Whiskey (Yankunytjatjara people), Tony Albert (Girramay/Yidinyji/Kuku Yalanji peoples), Gordon Hookey (Waanyi people) and Vincent Namatjira (Western Aranda people) – … More >
item.content:encoded:
Experience the free ‘Superpowered on Tour’ program in the Festival Hub garden as part of Horizon Kids. This program will feature activities created by the Children’s Art Centre in collaboration with four Australian artists – Kaylene Whiskey (Yankunytjatjara people), Tony Albert (Girramay/Yidinyji/Kuku Yalanji peoples), Gordon Hookey (Waanyi people) and Vincent Namatjira (Western Aranda people)...

Source

item.title: Jarjums Life Museum-Botanica
item.dc:creator: ben
item.description: Deep dive into the floral worlds of Jinibara and Kabi Kabi Country with Jarjum Life Museum’s Botanica work. Popping up at the Festival Hub garden this family friendly space will explore, play, and create with the natural wonders of Country. Jarjum Life Museum (JLM): Botanica will connect with Traditional Owners, Elders, community members and jarjum … More >
item.content:encoded:
Deep dive into the floral worlds of Jinibara and Kabi Kabi Country with Jarjum Life Museum’s Botanica work. Popping up at the Festival Hub garden this family friendly space will explore, play, and create with the natural wonders of Country. Jarjum Life Museum (JLM): Botanica will connect with Traditional Owners, Elders, community members and jarjum to create a hands-on...

Source

item.title: Circus Skills Workshop (sold out)
item.dc:creator: ben
item.description: Join us in the Festival Hub garden for a Circus workshop filled with fun and play! Fancy hula hoops, spinning plates, diablos, juggling and more!? Come and have fun and learn some new circus skills! CREATIVE TEAM Phoebe Manning Sarah Whitehead ABOUT THE ARTISTS Phoebe Manning and Sarah Whitehead are physical theatre performers based in … More >
item.content:encoded:
Join us in the Festival Hub garden for a Circus workshop filled with fun and play! Fancy hula hoops, spinning plates, diablos, juggling and more!? Come and have fun and learn some new circus skills! Phoebe Manning and Sarah Whitehead are physical theatre performers based in Meanjin. They are passionate about creating multi-disciplinary, accessible work that builds community and fosters connection.

Source

item.title: Story time with Codie & Ryan
item.dc:creator: ben
item.description: Join Codie and Ryan from Sunshine Coast Libraries for a rousing story time aboard the Troubadour Wagon in the Festival Hub garden. Showcasing classic stories and rhymes plus a few new ones for you to discover. If you love a good story or rhyme, you’ve come to the right place — you and your little … More >
item.content:encoded:
Join Codie and Ryan from Sunshine Coast Libraries for a rousing story time aboard the Troubadour Wagon in the Festival Hub garden. Showcasing classic stories and rhymes plus a few new ones for you to discover. If you love a good story or rhyme, you’ve come to the right place — you and your little one are guaranteed lots of fun and laughter.

Source

item.title: Junior Burger Rock Show
item.dc:creator: ben
item.description: Who says the adults get to have all the fun? Junior Burger is here to save you and your kids from boring kids music — replacing it with rad beats and tasty guitars that will make them kick the air, fist pump and go “ooooh yeeeaaaaah! Junior Burger is the brand new project from motorcycle … More >
item.content:encoded:
Who says the adults get to have all the fun? Junior Burger is here to save you and your kids from boring kids music — replacing it with rad beats and tasty guitars that will make them kick the air, fist pump and go “ooooh yeeeaaaaah! Junior Burger is the brand new project from motorcycle riding funklords Burger Joint and they’ve decided it’s about time the kids get a decent rock concert, too!

Source

item.title: Sunshine Coast Comedy Gala
item.dc:creator: ben
item.description: Strap in for an exclusive and hilarious preview of what’s coming your way in November, with the Sunshine Coast Comedy Festival Gala in the Wonderland Spiegeltent. It’s a world-class evening of stand-up comedy, showcasing some of the most exciting acts and new talent you’ll see at the 2023 Sunshine Coast Comedy Festival. From the uniquely … More >
item.content:encoded:
Strap in for an exclusive and hilarious preview of what’s coming your way in November, with the Sunshine Coast Comedy Festival Gala in the Wonderland Spiegeltent. It’s a world-class evening of stand-up comedy, showcasing some of the most exciting acts and new talent you’ll see at the 2023 Sunshine Coast Comedy Festival. From the uniquely dark wit of ABC TV’s Craig Quartermaine (“Laugh-out-loud...

Source

item.title: Rouge
item.dc:creator: ben
item.description: Circus for grown-ups: ROUGE is a decadent blend of sensational acrobatics, operatic cabaret, and tongue-in-cheek burlesque. All the spectacle of a circus with a deliciously deviant, adults-only twist — ROUGE is a mind-bending blend of death-defying acrobatics, grandiose cabaret and deeply twisted burlesque. A titillating celebration of astonishing proportions that’s surprising, subversive, and supremely sexy. … More >
item.content:encoded:
Circus for grown-ups: ROUGE is a decadent blend of sensational acrobatics, operatic cabaret, and tongue-in-cheek burlesque. All the spectacle of a circus with a deliciously deviant, adults-only twist — ROUGE is a mind-bending blend of death-defying acrobatics, grandiose cabaret and deeply twisted burlesque. A titillating celebration of astonishing proportions that’s surprising, subversive...

Source

item.title: Circus Wonderland: A Neverland Adventure
item.dc:creator: ben
item.description: Are you ready to go back to Neverland with JM Barrie’s classic story about Peter Pan, Wendy, Tinker Bell, pirates, mermaids and a ticking crocodile? Think your happy thoughts and get ready to take the second star to the right and head straight on till morning to ‘A Neverland Adventure’. Be amazed and captivated as … More >
item.content:encoded:
Are you ready to go back to Neverland with JM Barrie’s classic story about Peter Pan, Wendy, Tinker Bell, pirates, mermaids and a ticking crocodile? Think your happy thoughts and get ready to take the second star to the right and head straight on till morning to ‘A Neverland Adventure’. Be amazed and captivated as you are immersed in the fantastical world of Neverland and the Mermaid Cove.

Source

item.title: The Outhouse
item.dc:creator: ben
item.description: The Outhouse will take you on an interactive journey into the ridiculous and sublime. Meet Hope and Luna.  Two clowns launching into outer space in their outhouse rocket to give planet earth the rest and rejuvenation she needs.  This two-woman physical comedy for all ages combines clown, shadow puppetry and animation to create an experience … More >
item.content:encoded:
The Outhouse will take you on an interactive journey into the ridiculous and sublime. Meet Hope and Luna. Two clowns launching into outer space in their outhouse rocket to give planet earth the rest and rejuvenation she needs. This two-woman physical comedy for all ages combines clown, shadow puppetry and animation to create an experience that will touch your heart and make your spirits soar.

Source

item.title: Kabi Kabi Connections
item.dc:creator: ben
item.description: Kabi Kabi Connections is the union between time immemorial and the ephemeral, where sacred ways of knowing and being meet new technologies and the natural environment. Curated by knowledge keeper and artist, Helena Gulash and interdisciplinary artist James Muller, this immersive and meditative work illuminates the waters of the Maroochy River with the work of Traditional Custodians and visual arts … More >
item.content:encoded:
Kabi Kabi Connections is the union between time immemorial and the ephemeral, where sacred ways of knowing and being meet new technologies and the natural environment. Curated by knowledge keeper and artist, Helena Gulash and interdisciplinary artist James Muller, this immersive and meditative work illuminates the waters of the Maroochy River with the work of Traditional Custodians and visual arts...

Source
